column5: Was wondering if anyone has camped at Balsam Lake provincial park, I will be taking 2 boys 12 and 8 so I am hoping for good swimming and biking, I know the lake some and know the fishing is decent but to camp for a week I am looking for references. If you have a fav camp ground in roughly the same area (2-3 hours from Toronto) I am open to suggestions, Have a 14' alum boat.  Thanks   Jim
good sites good trails (don't know if bikes can go on them) good beach for swimming and great ramp and docking fishing can be good too  so 2 thumbs up
